metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7651 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
index.js in the ssri module before 5.2.2 for Node.js is prone to a regular expression denial of service vulnerability in strict mode functionality via a long base64 hash string.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-7651` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-ssri - 5.2.4-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-ssri package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.4-2').
